means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 帕斯特职业名称，牧人，来源于拉丁语，含义是“放牧”(to graze)

sentence.Network_en: In 1966, Pastor Albertz took over from him as governing mayor.
sentence.Network_cn: 1966年，帕斯特·艾伯茨接替他担任主管市长。

sentence.Network_en: Few things distracted the Pastor from the preparation of his weekly sermons.
sentence.Network_cn: 几乎没有什么事情能使牧师在准备每周的布道时分神。

sentence.Network_en: The pastor requested the women present to join him in prayer.
sentence.Network_cn: 牧师请在场的妇女们和他一起祈祷。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French pastour, from Latin pastor 'shepherd', from past- 'fed, grazed', from the verb pascere

entry.def: A pastor is a member of the Christian clergy in some Protestant churches.

means.word_mean: 1. a person authorized to conduct religious worship

auth_sentence.content: But Maryland evangelical pastor David Whitney sees it differently.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Maryland evangelical pastor David Whitney sees it differently.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Maryland evangelical pastor David Whitney sees it differently.

auth_sentence.content: Her pastor brought this up in the Sunday service.

auth_sentence.content: Mikolaj Bogdan Socha, the church's pastor.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,主要表示"人或物器"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 前辈,前任,[被取代的]原有事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre前+de+cess走+or人→前面走过的人→前辈
act行动,行为,扮演+or人或物器→n.男演员,行动者,参与者
aggress侵略,进攻+or人或物器→n.侵略者,攻击者
arbitrate仲裁,公断+or人或物器→n.仲裁人,公断者
auth+or人或物器→n.作家,创造者
collect收集+or人或物器→n.收藏家,征收者
compress挤压+or人或物器→n.压缩机
conquer征服,战胜+or人或物器→n.征服者,胜利者
create创作+or人或物器→n.创造者,创作者
credit贷款+or人或物器→n.债权人
designate指定+or人或物器→n.指示者,指定者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
stems_affixes.word_buile: detect察觉,发觉+or人或物器→n.发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
educate教育+or人或物器→educator教育家
execute执行+or人或物器→n.遗嘱执行人,执行者
gladiate剑状的+or人或物器→n.角斗士,与野兽搏斗者
indicate指示+or人或物器→n.指示器,[化]指示剂
ment精神+or人或物器→n.导师
moderate中等的+or人或物器→n.调解人,仲裁人
oppress压迫,压制+or人或物器→n.压迫者
past+or人或物器→原来是拉丁文"牧羊人"的意思
process过程,处理+or人或物器→n.处理机,处理器
proct监督+or人或物器→n.代理人,学监
project投射出+or人或物器→n.放映机

stems_affixes.value_cn: 海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员
stems_affixes.word_buile: sail航行+or人或物器→n.海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 继承者,接任者,后续的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: success成功,胜利+or人或物器→继续着别人的成功→继承者,接任者
vend出售+or人或物器→n.小贩
